name: Axiom
description:
Jump into the shoes of Miles as he battles to master his powers in order to uncover the truth about the enigmatic Axiom Corporation. Dive head first into the complexity of the human mind in electrifying fast-paced parkour and gripping story as Miles explores memories, exposes injustices and traverses psychedelic mindscapes.

  • FEATURES
  • Free-Running: Use a variety of leaps, wall-runs, rolls and slides to explore the world in quick, fluid movements
  • Mindscapes: Traverse captivating, mind-bending levels based on Non-Euclidean geometry
  • Narrative: Engaging story exploring family, corruption and the greater good…
